posts.title: My 1st Post
posts.body: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them. - Walt Disney

posts.title: My 2nd Post
posts.body: “The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.” - Chinese Proverb

posts.body: “I wake up every morning and think to myself, ‘how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours.’” - Leah Busque

posts.body: “Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.” - Joss Whedon

posts.title: My 5th Post
posts.body: “Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.” ― Dalai Lama XIV
